objects.specification: A durable floor surface in a light neutral tone with a subtle textured finish for slip resistance and visual interest, sized to cover the entire classroom area and accommodate all furnishings with comfortable spacing.
A vertical wall section finished in soft beige with a smooth surface, creating a warm and inviting backdrop for educational displays.
A vertical wall section finished in soft beige with a smooth surface, forming the front of the classroom and supporting the teaching board and accessories.
A vertical wall section finished in soft beige with a smooth surface, ideal for mounting educational posters and storage units.
A vertical wall section finished in soft beige with a smooth surface, featuring space for natural light and decorative elements.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes and a minimalistic frame to allow ample natural light into the classroom.
Simple lightweight curtains in muted blue fabric hung on a slim rod, providing adjustable coverage while complementing the seating upholstery.

A spacious teacher's desk crafted from light wood with a broad tabletop surface and modest under-desk storage, featuring rounded corners and sturdy legs for stability, complementing the student furniture with a cohesive aesthetic.
An ergonomic swivel chair upholstered in muted blue fabric with a padded seat and backrest, featuring a comfortable height and smooth swivel mechanism supported on a stable four-legged base.
A large rectangular blackboard with a smooth matte writing surface framed by a slim metal border, securely mounted above the teacher's desk for clear chalk presentation.
A tall open bookshelf made of light wood with multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted colorful books and educational materials, enhancing classroom organization.
A recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted glass diffuser providing soft white illumination in a low-profile design for even coverage.
A recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted glass diffuser providing soft white illumination in a low-profile design for even coverage.
A recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted glass diffuser providing soft white illumination in a low-profile design for even coverage.
A recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted glass diffuser providing soft white illumination in a low-profile design for even coverage.
A recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted glass diffuser providing soft white illumination in a low-profile design for even coverage.
A recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted glass diffuser providing soft white illumination in a low-profile design for even coverage.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable gray plastic with a smooth finish, placed near the teacher's desk for convenient disposal of paper and other classroom waste.
A classic circular wall clock with a white face, black numerals, and a slim black frame, providing clear time display at a comfortable viewing height.
A lush potted plant with vibrant green leaves in a simple ceramic pot, bringing natural ambiance and a welcoming feel to the corner of the classroom.
An educational poster showcasing colorful learning material in a simple matte finish, mounted on the wall to add visual interest and reinforce key concepts.
An educational poster showcasing colorful learning material in a simple matte finish, mounted on the wall to add visual interest and reinforce key concepts.
An educational poster showcasing colorful learning material in a simple matte finish, mounted on the wall to add visual interest and reinforce key concepts.

A sturdy rectangular student desk in a light wood tone with a smooth flat tabletop supported by four slender legs and a modest under-shelf, designed for classroom use.
A chair with a metal frame and molded seat and back upholstered in muted blue fabric, featuring ergonomic curves and padded seating for comfort.
